Madara Comforting Toner

Brand: Madara

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Centaurea Cyanus (Cornflower) Flower Water, Melissa Officinalis (Melissa) Water, Betaine, Chamomilla Recutita (Camomile) Flower Extract, Sodium PCA, Sodium levulinate, Hydrolysed Glycosaminoglycans, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Propanediol, Sodium B

ropanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Rhamnose, Glucose, Glucuronic Acid

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
